texts.name: Ludmilla
texts.biography: Born the daughter of the Duke of Bull, Ludmilla found from a young age that the politics of court were about as volatile and world-changing as a mouse's wind. Instinctively grasping for a surer, faster form of power, Ludmilla found herself living a secret life as she fell in with a den of Necromancers who had great plans for the future. When one of their number, a lascivious Vampire, became her lover, she took to wearing a studded collar as a coded symbol of her blossoming rebellion - that or to cover the bite marks. It was only a matter of time before she took the ritual, and became a Vampire herself. Immortality is such a boon when you're a power-hungry sybarite.

specialty.name: Bone Dragons
specialty.description: Increases the Speed of allied Bone Dragons, Ghost Dragons, and Spectral Dragons by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 20% for every 7 levels (rounded up).
